revised_title: Correcting Newton's Error on the Precession of the Equinoxes
tldr: The author, Samuel Vince, revisits Sir Isaac Newton's theory on the precession of the equinoxes and corrects an error in Newton's calculations. Vince provides a new solution based on Newton's principles, which simplifies the calculation and offers a more accurate estimation of the precession. The author acknowledges that the estimation remains uncertain due to potential inaccuracies in observations and the complexity of the Earth's density.
